page.title: 14THRESHFIELD CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: Boys and girls like to play{skipping which is a game where a{rope}is used.The{rope}is held at each end and turned.Another person goes to the middle of the{rope}and{jumps}when the rope reaches the floor. Another game is{"Tig".}One person is{"on"}and has to touch someone else who then becomes{"on".}One of my favourite games is{"relievo",}played with three or more people.The{catcher has to try to{catch}everyone before someone else releases them.The{catcher has to say{1,2,3}and the persons name to catch someone,for example if it was me he had found he had found he would say{1,2,3, Roseann.}If he finds everyone the{first person}caught would be on.If nobody is caught the person who was on would be on again.Other games played include,{hopscotch {,netball}and{football.
